phenotropil.name: Phenotropil
phenotropil.subname: Cognitive enhancer for focus and energy.
phenotropil.description:
What is Phenotropil?

Phenotropil is a powerful nootropic used to improve focus, memory, and energy levels. Originally developed for Russian astronauts, it’s widely used for cognitive enhancement.

Key Benefits

  • Improves mental clarity and focus.
  • Increases resistance to stress and fatigue.
  • Boosts overall cognitive performance.
phenotropil.dosage:
Recommended Dosage

Take 100mg daily in the morning after meals. For intensive use, consult a doctor for precise dosing instructions.

Contraindications

  • Not suitable for children, pregnant, or lactating individuals.
  • Avoid use after 3 PM to prevent insomnia.
phenotropil.research:
Scientific Studies

  • 1983: Research by Bobkov et al demonstrated improved cognitive function.
  • 2010: Studies showed efficacy in stroke rehabilitation (Koval’chuk et al).

Visit PubMed for more studies.

semax.name: Semax
semax.subname: Neuropeptide for memory and brain health.
semax.description:
What is Semax?

Semax is a synthetic neuropeptide used to improve memory and protect against brain damage. It’s widely studied for its cognitive-enhancing and neuroprotective properties.

Key Benefits

  • Promotes memory and learning.
  • Protects against neurodegeneration.
  • Boosts mental clarity and alertness.
semax.dosage:
Recommended Dosage

Administer 2-3 drops per nostril twice daily. Typical usage is 10-14 days. For longer use, consult a healthcare provider.

Contraindications

  • Not suitable for individuals with hypersensitivity to peptides.
  • Avoid during pregnancy or lactation without medical advice.
semax.research:
Scientific Studies

  • 2002: Research by Ashmarin et al highlighted its role in enhancing cognitive recovery after strokes.
  • 2015: Studies on neuroprotection in ischemic conditions showed its efficacy (PubMed ID: 25615853).

irs19.name: IRS-19
irs19.subname: Immune system support for a healthier you.
irs19.description:
What is IRS-19?

IRS-19 is an immune-enhancing nasal spray designed to strengthen the body’s defenses against respiratory infections.

Key Benefits

  • Boosts immune response.
  • Reduces respiratory tract infections.
  • Enhances recovery from colds and flu.
irs19.dosage:
Recommended Dosage

Spray once per nostril twice daily. Continue for at least 7-10 days or as recommended by a healthcare provider.

Contraindications

  • Not suitable for individuals with nasal hypersensitivity.
  • Avoid use in children under 2 years without medical supervision.
irs19.research:
Scientific Studies

  • 2001: A clinical trial demonstrated its efficacy in reducing acute respiratory infections in children.
  • 2017: Studies confirmed its immunomodulatory effects in adults (PubMed ID: 28514217).

noopept.name: Noopept
noopept.subname: Boost cognition and protect your brain.
noopept.description:
What is Noopept?

Noopept is a potent nootropic known for its memory-enhancing and neuroprotective properties. It’s widely used to boost brain function.

Key Benefits

  • Improves memory retention.
  • Enhances focus and concentration.
  • Supports overall brain health.
noopept.dosage:
Recommended Dosage

Take 10mg twice daily. Avoid exceeding 30mg in a single day. Recommended for short-term use only (up to 4 weeks).

Contraindications

  • Not recommended for individuals under 18.
  • Avoid use during pregnancy or lactation.
noopept.research:
Scientific Studies

  • 2009: Noopept was shown to have neuroprotective properties in cases of oxidative stress (PubMed ID: 19298799).
  • 2015: Memory-enhancing effects confirmed in clinical trials (PubMed ID: 25821775).

alpha_gpc.name: Alpha GPC
alpha_gpc.subname: Enhance memory and support brain health.
alpha_gpc.description:
What is Alpha GPC?

Alpha GPC is a natural choline compound that supports memory, learning, and overall brain health.

Key Benefits

  • Improves memory and cognitive function.
  • Supports brain cell repair.
  • Increases physical performance.
alpha_gpc.dosage:
Recommended Dosage

Take 300mg daily with a meal. Dosage may be increased to 600mg for enhanced effects.

Contraindications

  • Avoid in individuals with hypersensitivity to choline compounds.
  • Consult a doctor before use during pregnancy or lactation.
alpha_gpc.research:
Scientific Studies

  • 2010: Research confirmed its role in improving memory and learning in elderly patients (PubMed ID: 20655659).
  • 2016: Alpha GPC was shown to improve physical performance in athletes (PubMed ID: 26818747).

about.title: Who We Are
about.description: At Project V, we believe in unlocking the full potential of your mind. Specializing in sourcing the most innovative nootropic solutions, we bridge the gap between you and cutting-edge cognitive enhancers. We don't sell – we empower you by connecting you to trusted products and providers.

faqs.two: Do you sell the products directly?
faqs.three: How do I place an order?
faqs.seven: Can you ship to any country?
faqs.eight: Are your products safe and genuine?
faqs.nine: Is a prescription required to order?
faqs.ten: How do I contact you for more information?

answers.one: Project V is a logistic service company located in Russia. We specialize in helping customers order pharmaceutical and cognitive-enhancing goods that may not be available in their country. All purchases are for your personal use only.
answers.two: No, we do not sell products directly. We act on your behalf to seek and purchase products from trusted suppliers based on your individual orders.
answers.three: You can place an order by visiting our 'How to Order' section, filling out the required form, and we will assist you throughout the process.
answers.four: We are located in Russia, facilitating international orders for personal use.
answers.five: Shipping costs depend on the destination. Please contact us directly for a detailed quote based on your location.
answers.six: Delivery typically takes between 1 to 14 days, depending on your location.
answers.seven: Yes, we can arrange shipping to most countries. However, it is your responsibility to check the local regulations regarding the import of pharmaceutical goods.
answers.eight: We source products only from trusted suppliers. However, please consult with a medical professional before using any product.
answers.nine: In most cases, a prescription is not required, but some products may require one depending on the laws in your country. Please check your local regulations.
answers.ten: You can contact us via email, Telegram, X (formerly Twitter), or the online chat feature on our website for any additional assistance.

productPage.disclaimer: All statements on this page are for informational purposes only and have not been evaluated. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Before using this product, consulting a qualified MD is mandatory.
